headline: Viatris Inc. (VTRS) Enters $515M IV Iron Market With FDA Green Light
summary: In this article, we will be taking a look at the 12 Cheap Healthcare Stocks to Buy Now. Viatris Inc. is one of them. Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS), a global healthcare company formed from the 2020 merger of Mylan and Pfizer’s Upjohn division, continues to expand its presence in both generics and specialty pharmaceuticals.
